description_txt: stated on June 23, 2017 in a press release:
quote_txt: "Western New Yorkers pay some of the highest property taxes in the state."

description_txt: stated on July 6, 2017 in an interview on MSNBC:
quote_txt: "Cuba is far more sanctioned than North Korea."

description_txt: stated on June 19, 2017 in an interview:
quote_txt: "There are so many data that demonstrate that poor people, surprisingly, are less likely to use drugs than people with means."

description_txt: stated on June 21, 2017 in a blog:
quote_txt: Spicer: "Trump has the legal right to cancel SCOTUS because they serve at his pleasure"

description_txt: stated on July 4, 2017 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "Gas prices are the lowest in the U.S. in over ten years!"

description_txt: stated on June 22, 2017 in an Internet post:
quote_txt: Says the manager of a Checkers in Miami Gardens, Fla., killed 10 employees.

description_txt: stated on July 3, 2017 in Internet posts:
quote_txt: Australia is microchipping its public.

description_txt: stated on June 9, 2017 in a radio interview brought to light June 20, 2017:
quote_txt: Says that Bill Clinton "basically" told then-Attorney General Loretta Lynch in 2016 that "we killed Vince Foster."

description_txt: stated on June 29, 2017 in an Internet post:
quote_txt: "Donald Trump plans to step down as President of the United States and resign from office within the next 30 days."

description_txt: stated on June 29, 2017 in a White House press briefing:
quote_txt: "The president in no way, form or fashion has ever promoted or encouraged violence."

description_txt: stated on July 2, 2017 in an episode of "Fox News Sunday":
quote_txt: 7 million people the Congressional Budget Office says won't have health insurance coverage under the Senate health care bill "don't exist."

description_txt: stated on June 18, 2017 in an interview:
quote_txt: Since he and Scott Walker took office in 2011, "60,000 new jobs have been created in this state -- 40,000 of them were created in Madison and the Madison area."

description_txt: stated on June 27, 2017 in a tweet:
quote_txt: CNN’s ratings are "way down."

description_txt: stated on June 24, 2017 in Internet posts:
quote_txt: Minnesota imposed an Islamic anti-blasphemy law.

description_txt: stated on June 22, 2017 in a campaign video:
quote_txt: "I have seen crime increase in every major metropolitan area (in California) … Crime is on the rise in every major market."

description_txt: stated on June 8, 2017 in a radio interview:
quote_txt: Says Scott Walker recently said "he got his bald spot from hitting his head on a cabinet, and it's not a joke, he actually said that his bald spot came because he hit his head on a cabinet."

description_txt: stated on June 28, 2017 in a Facebook live speech:
quote_txt: "There is no reason for anybody to be losing any of their current benefits under Medicaid."

description_txt: stated on June 28, 2017 in an immigration roundtable discussion:
quote_txt: "We're pretty much at the 50 percent mark" on deportations of MS-13 gang members.

description_txt: stated on June 21, 2017 in a segment on her show "Full Frontal":
quote_txt: The New York State Senate "passed legislation allowing minors to race snowmobiles, get their own hunting licenses, and not be employed gathering or picking rags, cigar stumps, or collecting bones."

description_txt: stated on June 27, 2017 in a White House briefing:
quote_txt: France "wouldn’t buy Texas beef for some reason, yet 76 percent of their energy comes from nuclear power."

description_txt: stated on June 17, 2017 in a blog post:
quote_txt: "U.N. official John Ashe set to testify against the Clintons may not have died by accident."

description_txt: stated on June 26, 2017 in an op-ed in the New York Times:
quote_txt: "We are $20 trillion in debt. The Congressional Budget Office projects an additional $129 trillion of accumulated deficits over the next 30 years."

description_txt: stated on June 27, 2017 in in a blog post:
quote_txt: "Leonardo DiCaprio explains why he’s moving to Casselberry, Florida."

description_txt: stated on June 5, 2017 in an interview:
quote_txt: When he was Milwaukee County executive, "eight years in a row we pushed through budgets that did not increase the tax levy from the previous year."

description_txt: stated on June 7, 2017 in a press release:
quote_txt: "Texas mothers are dying during childbirth at the highest rates in the nation."

description_txt: stated on June 28, 2017 in in a tweet:
quote_txt: "28.2 million Americans are still waiting under Obamacare and remain uninsured!"

description_txt: stated on June 25, 2017 in an interview on Fox News Sunday:
quote_txt: "Actually, on some procedures, you're more likely to die if you're on Medicaid than if you're uninsured."

description_txt: stated on June 27, 2017 in an appearance on 'Fox & Friends':
quote_txt: Under the House health care bill, Medicaid spending "actually goes up 20 percent over the next 10 years."

description_txt: stated on June 23, 2017 in a headline:

description_txt: stated on June 27, 2017 in an interview with Fox News:
